Title: Provides that the state shall make reasonable efforts to obtain federal funding for child care expenses and prohibits limiting authorized child care services based on proof of immigration status
Summary: Provides that the state shall make reasonable efforts to obtain federal funding for child care expenses; prohibits limiting authorized child care services based on proof of immigration status; authorizes self-attestation as an approved form of verification of employment status and income.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to removing unnecessary barriers to child care subsidies for eligible children and families
